title: Introduction to our blog!
body:
## **Welcome to the Official Furem Media Blog/Newsroom**

Here we will announce new services and products and make sure you guys are the first to know! We care deepely about our customers and feel they should know whats going on in Furem, hence this website! Unfortunately our Blog and Main website are seperate but you can always get from one to the other extremely easily!

We really hope you enjoy and use this brand new medium of commuication for us and we hope we can engage with you, our audience and customers, even more than ever!

\- Josh Brigden, CEO.
